message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value, making it an investment that could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $12000 for this product. I believe this offer reflects its true worth and provides a fair opportunity for both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
